name: Scrappy's Pizzeria
description:
You are a cat running a makeshift restaurant in a dirty alleyway, where you serve trash-topped pizza to your feline friends. Unfortunately, every time you rummage through the garbage you find something completely different, leading to a forever-expanding menu of combinations. Can you keep up with the demand?

Click and drag a pizza from the pizza box in the bottom left

Drag toppings from the containers across the middle onto the pizza

Drag your pizza onto the counter to serve it to the cat with the corresponding order!
